item.title: How to download Veeam Backup & Replication 9.5 update 1
item.description: The general process for getting an early release of Veeam Backup & Replication 9.5 Update 1, which adds support for vCenter 6.5, is making a support ticket with Veeam asking for the RC. If you don’t want to go through that hassle you can just download it directly here: https://download2.veeam.com/veeam_backup_9.5.0.802.update1.RC.zip Usual disclaimer applies: is not official release software etc. etc. etc.
